unnormalised: kalchea trasdayak zalelya matchent, Bharotan Ausacher vireudh 245/8 asa korun zoit zoddlem, zalear Ausak fokot 240 ponnos korun out zaunk poddlem. Viratan 110 bollank 112 ponnos korun ulaakani keli, taka Man of the Match puraskar mell'llo.
normalised: kalchea dhad dhad korunchea matchent, Bharotan A-u-s add vostu zhikhli, don xem challis ponch vis aatthaan bhag keli munn mell'llea skoraant, zalear A-u-s-ak fokot don xem challis soglem outt korpak mell'llem. Viratan don porim'malichem ek xem bara runn ek xem dha bollamni ghale, taka matchem monis inam mell'llem.

unnormalised: Adhi, PKL-ant, Patna Pirates-an Bengal Warriors-acher 40-35 asa korun zoit zoddlem. Pardeep Narwal ujean aslo, Patna khatir 18 raid points kele. Matchent sumar 75 points zoddle, hem dekhun fans-ank ek damyachem chitra dislem.
normalised: Modlean, P-K-L-nt, Patna Pairattz hannim Bongal Voriyorzh hangak chollis teas tisponch skoraan haroile. Pardeep Naraval bhangarachim follam zoddtelea sarkea asn, Patna khatir atthra red point zoddle. Matchen sogle mellun ponch vis point zoddlele dakhovle, fansank ek dhadakichem dorxonn.

unnormalised: Teach vellar, sthanik cricket league-ant, Challengers-an Warriors-acher 6 wickets-an zoit zoddlem. Warriors-an 150/7 ponnos kele, ani Challengers-an te 18.2 overs-ant pakhre kele. Rohit Sharman Challengers khatir fokot 40 bollank 60 ponnos zoddle.
normalised: Tem'mer, sthanik krikett ligeant, Chellinzarzh hannim Voriyorzh add vostu so viktetanim zhikhli. Voriyorzh hannim ek xem ponch vis sat'ta bhag keli munn mell'llem, ani Chellinzaran tem atthra point don ovrant dhavun gheunche vatter lagle. Rohit Sharmann chellinzarant fakot challis bollamni sast runn zoddle.

unnormalised: Football-ant, Mumbai City FC ani Bengaluru FC 2-2 ponnos korun sarikhe zaale. Sunil Chhetri-n Bengaluru khatir doguy ponnos kele, zalear Igor Angulo ani Bipin Singh-an Mumbai khatir ball marle. Match khub dhoomdhamak asle, sumar 4 yellow cards dile.
normalised: Futtbolant, Mumboi Siti Ef-Si hannim Benglluru Ef-Si add vostu don teas don draa korunk paavle. Sunil Chhetri hannem Benglluru khatir donui goll kel'le, zalear Igor Angulo ani Bipin Singan Mumboik nett dhaddle. Matchen khub karvai dakhoili, ani sogle mellun char pille kard ditle.

unnormalised: Nimannem, badminton-ant, PV Sindhu All England Open-chea dusrea feriek bhitor geli, tinnem aplo virodi 21-18, 21-15 asa korun haroilo. Ticho fuddlo match 14/03/2024-ak asa.
normalised: Xevttim, bedmintaant, P-Vi Sindhu All Ingland Open-achea fuddlea roundak paavli, tinnem apnnachea protidvandvak vinn'talli ek xem atthra, vinn'talli ek xem pondra haroile. Tichem fuddlem matchem chaudak mach don hazar vinn'talli chartik aspaavlolem asa.
